text: @narendramodi @narendramodi @PMOIndia @indiagovernment @AmitShah  I request you sir, that due to this #coronavirus if you can please ask banks not to deduct money of the people who have loans and its on auto debit. Because people like me who is not getting paid in this period have no choice.
